name: Circling The Globe
description:
Left/Right Arrows or A/D to move.

Adjust your trajectory to make it through the rings as you zip around the world. Miss one and it's game over!

This game was made as an entry for TriJam #135 with the theme of "Circles", completed in 3 hours and 53 minutes, with plenty of setbacks along the way. Overall it's missing a lot of features, but has the bare-bones for a bigger project. I could of spent an extra 30 minutes finishing up some touchups like a score screen or music, but as I was already over the allotted 3 hours I didn't want to push too much further.

Please enjoy, and feel free to leave feedback :)
